00015 Cassandra::Cassandra (SparseMatrix* actionTransitions,
00016                         SparseMatrix* actionObservations,
00017                         SparseMatrix** rewards,
00018                         int numActions, int numStates, 
00019                         int numObservations, float discount) {
00020 
00021         init (actionTransitions, actionObservations, rewards,numActions,numStates,
00022                 numObservations, (random()%numStates),discount);

00026                         SparseMatrix* actionObservations,

00036 void Cassandra::init (SparseMatrix* actionTransitions,
00037                         SparseMatrix* actionObservations,
00038                         SparseMatrix** rewards,
00039                         int numActions, int numStates, 
00040                         int numObservations, int startState, float discount)
00041 {
00042         this->actionTransitions = actionTransitions;
00043         this->actionObservations = actionObservations;
00044         this->rewards = rewards;
00045         
00046         this->numActions = numActions;
00047         this->numStates = numStates;
00048         this->numObservations = numObservations;
00049         
00050         this->discount = discount;
00051         
00052         this->currState = startState;
00053         
00054         //As each observation depends upon the execution of
00055         //an action, we can have no initial observation. 
00056         lastState = currObservation = currAction = 0;
00057         
00058         this->cheat = false;
00059 }
00060 
00061 int Cassandra::doAction (Vector& action) {
00062         return doAction ( (int)action [0]);
00063 }
00064 
00065 int Cassandra::doAction (int a) {
00066         assert (a < (int)numActions);
00067         
00068         currAction = a;
00069         
00070         Vector stateTransRow (numStates);
00071         stateTransRow = row (actionTransitions [currAction], currState);
00072 
00073         lastState = currState;
00074         currState = Sampler::discrete (stateTransRow, 1.0);
00075         
00076         Vector observationRow (numObservations);
00077         observationRow = row (actionObservations [currAction], currState);
00078         
00079         if(!cheat)
00080                 currObservation = Sampler::discrete (observationRow, 1.0);
00081         else
00082                 currObservation = (currState / numStates) * numObservations;
00083                 
00084 //      cout << "[" << currAction << "," << lastState << "," << currState << "," << currObservation << "," << getReward () << "]" << endl;
00085         //cerr << "[" << currAction << "," << lastState << "," << currState << "," << currObservation << "," << getReward () << "]" << endl;
00086         return 0;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void Cassandra::getObservation(Observation& obs) {
00090         //Is this right??
00091         if(!cheat)
00092                 obs.getFeatures() (0,0) = currObservation;
00093         if(cheat)
00094                 obs.getFeatures() (0,0) = currState;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void Cassandra::getReward (Vector& rewards) {
00098         rewards [0] = getReward();
00099 }
00100 
00101 int Cassandra::getReward () {
00102         
00103                 return (this->rewards [currAction] [lastState]) 
00104                         (currState, currObservation);
00105         
00106                         
00107 }

00109 void Cassandra::print () {
00110         cout << "numActions: " << numActions << endl;
00111         cout << "numStates: " << numStates << endl;
00112         cout << "numObservations: " << numObservations << endl;
00113         cout << "discount: " << discount << endl;
00114         
00115         cout << "obsRows: " << this->getObsRows () << endl;
00116         cout << "obsColumns: " << this->getObsCols() << endl;
00117         cout << "Action Transitions: " << endl;
00118         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numActions; i++) {
00119                 cout << i << ":" << actionTransitions [i] << endl;
00120         }
00121         cout << "Action Observations: " << endl;
00122         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numActions; i++) {
00123                 cout << i << ":" << actionObservations [i] << endl;
00124         }
00125         cout << "Rewards: " << endl;
00126         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numActions; i++) {
00127                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00128                         cout << i <<"," << j  << ":" << rewards [i] [j]<< endl;
00129                 }
00130         }
00131 }
